vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.24.7
§ Jehoiarib = "Jehovah contends"
1) A priest in Jerusalem
2) the head of the 1st of the 24 courses of priests in David's time
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a) יוֹיָרִיב   sacerdote; post exílico; (b)   sacerdote; en tiempos de David
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
耶何雅立 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "耶和華抗爭"
耶路撒冷的一位祭司 (代上 9:10, 24:7)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
耶何雅立 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "耶和华抗争"
耶路撒冷的一位祭司 (代上 9:10, 24:7)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at 1Ch.9.10;
father of: Jedaiah (H3048); also called Jehoiarib at 1Ch.9.10;
Another name of yo.ya.riv (יוֹיָרִיב "Joiarib" H3114)
§ Jehoiarib = "Jehovah contends"
1) A priest in Jerusalem
2) the head of the 1st of the 24 courses of priests in David's time
